description:
An injured Shinobu arrives at Wonder Hill after encountering card hunters. Danji`s facial expression changes upon hearing Shinobu`s story, and he sets off alone. When Megumi and the others return to the amusement park after participating in a meeting of leaders in Danji`s stead, they find their fallen comrades with a completely changed Tohya standing amidst them.
Source: Funimation
